branchItem.name: HRW, High Performance Heat Exchanger
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacities: 2 kW, 8 kW, 15 kW, 30 kW <LI>Temperature range setting: 20 to 90°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.3°C <LI>Power supply requirement: 3-phase 200 VAC / 50Hz or 3-phase 200~208 VAC / 60Hz <LI>Circulating fluid: Clear or deionized water, fluorinated liquid, or 60% ethylene glycol solution <LI>Standards: UL, CE, SEMI (S2-0703, S8-1103, F47-0200), SEMATECH (S2-93, S8-95)</LI></UL>
